programme.title: Day care and recreation
programme.short_synopsis: The unexpected success of the newspaper USA Today; day care becomes an election issue.
programme.medium_synopsis: As the 1988 election looms closer, day care becomes a prime issue. Alistair Cooke reflects on the unexpected success of the newspaper USA Today, founded in 1982.
